ie.gmit.dip

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.dip.Loader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextLoader

    public abstract class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass for the loader program. Contains principal methods for loading text. Text Loader inherits from it.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladimir Novac

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String keyWordsFile
      String that will hold the filename for the google words.
      (package private) static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keyWordsSet
      A set that will hold Strings for the google words.
      (package private) java.lang.String thesaurusFile
      String that wil hold the filename for the thesaurus.
      (package private) static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> wordThesaurus
      A map that will hold Strings as both keys and values for the thesaurus.

    • Field Detail

      • wordThesaurus

        static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> wordThesaurus

    • Constructor Detail

      • Loader

        Loader(java.lang.String keyWordsFile,
       java.lang.String thesaurusFile)
        Constructor for loader class. Takes the file paths for google words and thesaurus file as Strings. Initialises the map and the set.
        Parameters:
        keyWordsFile - file path for the google words file
        thesaurusFile - file path for the thesaurus file

    • Method Detail

      • init

        abstract void init()
        Generic method for running the loader program. Multiple private methods can added inside to establish order of operations.
